In England, in the seven days to 22 October, there were 273,747 new confirmed cases (484.1 new cases per 100,000). In the seven days to 15 October, there were 253,668 new cases and so the new cases have risen by 8% (20,079 extra cases). The number of confirmed COVID-19 cases in England so far as at 27 October is 7,564,400 (13,376.4 cases per 100,000 population).
